glossary.label: express
glossary.text: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications

glossary.label: ServiceProvider
glossary.text: A way to manage inner/outer modules, chasi allows separation of logic/implementation. Developers can utilize this implementation to further isolate logic.

glossary.label: CompilerEngine
glossary.text: chasi internal module that handles SSR and frontend stuff

glossary.label: HTTP Method
glossary.text: HTTP method of an endpoint, e.g. (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, PATCH, SEARCH). a full route endpoint can be similar but have a different HTTP method, and will be routed accordingly.

glossary.label: Vitest
glossary.text: A native test runner that magically works with TypeScript, and follows most common patterns in testing, but is lightning fast. You can check vitest website for more info: https://vitest.dev/
